backend/career-path.mo: Defines data types for career paths, profiles, assessments, analytics, job recommendations, and related structures used across the backend.
backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing core job platform types and logic, including profiles, jobs, applications, messaging, scheduling, notifications, and storage integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading user profile customization to include an optional profile picture field while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking UI profile picture enhancements to relevant frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode settings, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, dashboard rendering, and theme/query providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActivityMo: Admin UI stub showing placeholder for future real-time activity monitoring.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAIIns: Admin dashboard rendering various charts using mock data to display AI-driven insights.
frontend/src/components/admin/Certificat: Admin interface for managing certifications with filters, stats, and placeholder handlers.
frontend/src/components/admin/CompanyPag: Admin UI for reviewing and moderating company pages with search, filters, and status actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/SystemAnal: Admin placeholder UI for future system-wide analytics and performance metrics.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Admin placeholder UI for browsing and managing users.
Interactive AI chat assistant component with roleâ€‘based welcome messages, quick actions, and message handling.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Career: Displays career path recommendations, triggers generation of mock data, and shows loading or empty states.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Certif: Shows earned certifications and progress toward in-progress certifications using placeholder data.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Growth: Displays candidate growth metrics and learning progress with progress cards and summaries.
frontend/src/components/candidate/JobSea: Implements a job search interface with filters for experience, salary, and rating, showing search results.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Resume: Shows resume analysis loading, feature notice, and empty state using backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/employer/AIInsig: Displays mock hiring analytics, charts, and AI recommendations with a timeframe selector.
frontend/src/components/employer/Candida: UI for searching, filtering, sorting, and viewing detailed growth and career path data for candidates.
frontend/src/components/employer/Company: Form for employers to create or update company branding, including name, description, location, website, logo, and banner uploads.
frontend/src/components/employer/CreateA: Empty placeholder file for an assessment creation modal.
frontend/src/components/employer/CreateJ: Empty placeholder file for a job creation modal.
frontend/src/components/employer/EditInt: Empty placeholder file for an interview edit modal.
frontend/src/components/employer/EditJob: Empty placeholder file for a job edit modal.
frontend/src/components/employer/Feedbac: Empty placeholder file for a feedback modal.
frontend/src/components/employer/Intervi: Empty placeholder for an employer interviews tab.
frontend/src/components/employer/JobList: Empty placeholder for an employer job listings tab.
frontend/src/components/employer/Recomme: Empty placeholder for AI or candidate recommendations tab.
frontend/src/components/employer/Schedul: Empty placeholder for an interview scheduling modal.
frontend/src/components/employer/TestRes: Empty placeholder for a test results modal.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with a copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai, including a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main header with login/logout handling, user info display, theme toggle, and optional simulation button for admins.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardTab.t: Displays the leaderboard with filtering, sorting, badge icons, and highlights the current user's ranking.
frontend/src/components/LearningHubTab.t: Shows learning resources with search, category filtering, progress tracking, and actions to save or complete items.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCustomiza: Provides UI for editing profile customization including bio, contact info, and profile picture upload with validation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal shown on first use to collect basic profile details and role, then save them via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/ReferralsTab.tsx: UI for viewing referral stats and list, creating referrals, and showing implementation placeholder.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized react-query wrappers and TypeScript models for backend operations related to users, jobs, candidates, and learning data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and mounts the application.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for managing users, analytics, activity, company pages, AI insights, and certifications.
frontend/src/pages/CandidateDashboard.ts: Defines a candidate dashboard with tabbed navigation for learning, growth tracking, career path, certifications, leaderboard, resume analysis, referrals, and profile customization.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerDashboard.tsx: Defines an employer dashboard with tabbed sections for learning, leaderboard, AI insights, company branding, referrals, and profile customization.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero section, featured companies list, and platform feature highlights, using login and company page data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and pending requests focused on adding and persisting user profile pictures.
